alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; Runnels; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:48PM CDT until June 17 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coleman County in west central Texas... East central Tom Green County in west central Texas... Southeastern Runnels County in west central Texas... Northern Concho County in west central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 548 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lowake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Paint Rock around 600 PM CDT. Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina around 625 PM CDT. Leaday around 630 PM CDT. Talpa around 635 PM CDT. Voss around 640 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Us- 83 Near The Concho-Runnels County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929 and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
